option.od: print the help message and exit.
print the RST version number and exit.
verbose. Log information to the console.
use the threshold factor thr to detemine whether data is saved or not. If this option is specified the existing threshold in the file is ignored (note: this option is deprecated)
filename of the raw (dat) format file to convert.

synopsis.p: Converts a raw (dat) format file to rawacf format.

description.p: Converts a raw (dat) format file to rawacf format.
The rawacf format data is written to standard output.

example.description: Convert the file "test.dat" to the rawacf format file "test.rawacf".
